question: Tolong jelaskan cara menggunakan LINKING VERB

answers.answer:
penggunaan Linking verbs berfungsi sebagai kata (kerja) penghubung antara subjek dengan keterangannya.
example: The kids act foolish.

Act dalam kalimat itu adalah contoh linking verb.

semoga bisa membantu ^_^,,,
maaf kalau ada yang salah ^_^,,,

related_questions.question:
Choose the inappropriate structure in the following sentences    rima : they said the exam was complicated. Do You think so ?
Ami : I Disagree with you. You can see that everyone's score is satisfied.

answers.answer:
rima : they said the exam complicated. Did You think so ?
Ami : I was Disagree with you. You can saw that everyone's score was satisfied.

related_questions.question: Tolong describe dengan tema "my beloved home"

answers.answer:
My beloved home

It is located in the central park. My home is the sweetest home on my complex. It has green roof which is made from special clay. Therefore it is always shining when the sun light rise in the morning.

my home.. my everything.. even my home not as huge the president home or a museums.. even my home don't as rich as the businessman home.. i love my home.. because my home protect me from the light of the sun , from the extreme weather , from the cold of the rain.. but i still love my home..home sweet home.. you're my protecter from childhood.. how bad you're you still my home... i called it my beloved home

related_questions.question: Pengertian dan contoh adverb of frequency

answers.answer: adverb yang menggambarkan frekuensi seseorang melakukan suatu pekerjaan, misalnya setiap hari, atau beberapa kali dalam 1 bulan
pengertian : kata keterangan yang menyatakan seberapa sering suatu kegiatan yang dilakukan.

related_questions.question: Buat text hartatory explenation  yang berjudul effect of insomnia

answers.answer:
Effect of Insomnia
Horatory -> thesis -> reason -> suggestion

Insomnia is kind of illness that makes people hard to sleep. Due to its negative effect, this illness is categorized as the dangerous symptoms. The reason could be classified from Internal feelings of the person. Therefore if we have this illness, better to have consultation toward the doctor. We stand to benefit by the greater time of sleep that we have.

related_questions.question:
Ubahlah menjadi indirect speech!    1. Kiki said '' What's will you buy in the mall?''
2. Mrs. Maria said '' Can you speak englsh well?''
3. Yuda said Tika '' Are you from Surabaya?''

answers.answer:
kalau kalimatnya pertanyaan sebaiknya jangan pakai 'said' tapi pakai 'asked (verb 2 dari ask)', jadinya...
1. Kiki asked me what would I buy in the mall : menggunakan me karena menceritakan kembali
2. Mrs. Maria asked me if I could speak English very well : menggunakan me karena menceritakan kembali
3. Yuda asked Tika if was she from Surabaya : menggunakan she karena menceritakan kembali

semoga membantu :)

1. kiki asked me what would i buy in the mall.
2. Mrs. Maria asked me can i speak English well
3. Yuda asked Tika was she from Surabaya

related_questions.question:
Tolong buatin dialog expresing anger :)
untuk 2 orang

answers.answer:
Everyone Has Bad Day
Sari : Hey, Rangga!
Rangga : What displeasure!
Sari : What? What happened, Rangga? Are you angry about something?
Rangga : Oh, I’m very sorry, Sari. I was walking near handkerchief. You can wipe up your wet shirt.
Rangga : Oh, thank you, Sari. So, how was your day, Sari? Did something bad happen to you too? Haha I’m kidding, Sari.
Sari : Actually, something bad did happen to me. It’s still driving me mad until now.
Rangga : Oh, really? What do you look so insulted about?
Sari : It’s my boss. He said that I can have a day-offs earlier but today he revoked what he said. I was planning on going for a vacation on my day-offs with my family. I am extremely displeased about that.
Rangga : I’m sorry to hear that.
Sari : Well, everyone has bad day but if we still consider it positively, everything is going to be alright
Rangga : Yeah, I think you’re right

A = why are you scared?
B = i'am sorry. i spoil your diary.
A = what?? why did you do that?
B = i didn't purposely. sorry
A = wether the sorry can repair all?
B = OK. i will replace your diary, but iam sorry
A = it's up to you.

related_questions.question: Tolong jelasin secara singkat "Conditional Sntence" Type 3 ,trims..

answers.answer:
kalimat pengandaian untuk masa lalu dimana kalimatnya bertentangan
main clouse( s+ would/should+have+v3) if clouse( if+s+had+v3) jika if clouse tidak mempunyai kata kerja maka ditambah have been
contoh : he could have if his computer had not broken down

Suatu kalimat pengandainya yang bertentangan dengan masa lalu.
Contohnya :
If you had said your guilty, I would have forgiven you
If + past perfect, S + would/should + have + past participle
